name: @arraypress/waveform-player
description: Lightweight, customizable audio player with waveform visualization

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:iife && npm run build:esm && npm run build:min && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:demo: npm run build:css && mkdir -p demo/dist && cp dist/*.js demo/dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp dist/*.css demo/dist/
scripts.dev:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:demo && concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run dev:css"
scripts.size: npm run build:min && npm run build:css && echo 'JS:' && gzip -c dist/waveform-player.min.js | wc -c && echo 'CSS:' && gzip -c dist/waveform-player.css | wc -c

author: ArrayPress
